trans-unit.source: Provides standard facilities for creating and managing a type-safe, ordered collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumn" /> objects.
This collection supports standard zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: Esta colección admite la indización de base cero estándar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Table.Columns%2A> property provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Table> class returns a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Table.Columns%2A> propiedad proporcionada por el <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Table> clase devuelve un <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection>.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Manipulate a Table's Columns through the Columns Property](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-manipulate-table-columns-through-the-columns-property.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [Cómo: manipular columnas de una tabla mediante la propiedad Columns](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-manipulate-table-columns-through-the-columns-property.md).

trans-unit.source: A table column to append to the collection of columns.
Appends a specified item to the collection.
Raised when *item* already belongs to a collection.
Raised when *item* is **null**.
Gets or sets the pre-allocated collection item capacity for this collection.
The pre-allocated collection item capacity for this collection.
trans-unit.target: La colección preasignar una cantidad de capacidad de elementos de esta colección.

trans-unit.source: The default value is **8**.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es **8**.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.Capacity%2A> property represents the number of pre-allocated slots for storing items in this collection, whereas the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.Count%2A> property represents the actual number of items currently in the collection.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.Capacity%2A> propiedad representa el número de ranuras preasignadas para almacenar elementos de esta colección, mientras que la <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.Count%2A> propiedad representa el número real de elementos actualmente en la colección.

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.Capacity%2A> is always at least as large as the value of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: El valor de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.Capacity%2A> siempre es al menos tan grande como el valor de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.Count%2A>.

trans-unit.source: When newly added collection items cause the collection count to exceed the collection capacity, the capacity is automatically increased to accommodate the newly added collection items.
trans-unit.target: Cuando los elementos de la colección recién agregado hacen el recuento de colección que se exceda la capacidad de la colección, la capacidad se incrementa automáticamente para adaptarse a los elementos de la colección recién agregado.

trans-unit.source: Increasing the collection capacity involves allocating additional collection slots, which incurs both performance and memory overhead.
trans-unit.target: Aumentar la capacidad de colección implica asignar ranuras de colección adicionales, lo que conlleva el rendimiento y la sobrecarga de memoria.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.Capacity%2A> property to optimize the collection capacity in cases where the total or maximum number of collection items is known in advance.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.Capacity%2A> propiedad para optimizar la capacidad de colección en casos donde el número total o máximo de elementos de la colección se conoce de antemano.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.TrimToSize%2A> method to cause the collection capacity to equalized with the current collection count.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.TrimToSize%2A> método para hacer que la capacidad de colección se igualan con el recuento actual de la colección.

trans-unit.source: Raised when an attempt is made to set <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.TableCellCollection.Capacity" /> to a value that is less than the current value of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.TableCellCollection.Count" />.
Clears all items from the collection.

After calling <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.Clear%2A>, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.Count%2A> property becomes **0** and the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.Capacity%2A> property is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Después de llamar a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.Clear%2A>, el valor de la <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.Count%2A> propiedad deja de estar **0** y el valor de la <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.Capacity%2A> no se ha modificado la propiedad.

trans-unit.source: To set a new capacity, call <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.TrimToSize%2A> or explicitly set a new capacity through the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.Capacity%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para establecer una nueva capacidad, llame a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.TrimToSize%2A> o establecer explícitamente una nueva capacidad mediante la <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.Capacity%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: An item to query for the presence of in the collection.
Queries for the presence of a specified item in the collection.
**true** if the specified *item* is present in the collection; otherwise, **false**.
Copies the contents of the collection and inserts them into a specified array starting at a specified index position in the array.
A one-dimensional array to which the collection contents will be copied.
This array must use zero-based indexing.
A zero-based index in <c>array</c> specifying the position at which to begin inserting the copied collection objects.
Copies the contents of the collection and inserts them into a specified array starting at a specified index position in the array.

Raised when *array* includes items that are not compatible with the type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumn" />, or if *arrayIndex* specifies a position that falls outside of the bounds of *array*.
Raised when *array* is **null**.
Raised when *arrayIndex* is less than **0**.
A one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumn" /> array to which the collection contents will be copied.
This array must use zero-based indexing.
A zero-based index in <c>array</c> specifying the position at which to begin inserting the copied collection objects.
Copies the contents of the collection and inserts them into a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumn" /> array of starting at a specified index position in the array.

Raised when *array* includes items that are not compatible with the type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumn" />, or if *arrayIndex* specifies a position that falls outside of the bounds of *array*.
Raised when *array* is **null**.
Raised when *arrayIndex* is less than **0**.
Gets the number of items currently contained by the collection.
The number of items currently contained by the collection.
trans-unit.target: Número de elementos que contiene actualmente la colección.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.Capacity%2A> property represents the number of pre-allocated slots for storing items in this collection, whereas the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.Count%2A> property represents the actual number of items currently in the collection.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.Capacity%2A> propiedad representa el número de ranuras preasignadas para almacenar elementos de esta colección, mientras que la <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.Count%2A> propiedad representa el número real de elementos actualmente en la colección.

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.Capacity%2A> is always at least as large as the value of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: El valor de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.Capacity%2A> siempre es al menos tan grande como el valor de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.Count%2A>.

trans-unit.source: When newly added collection items cause the collection count to exceed the collection capacity, the capacity is automatically increased to accommodate the newly added collection items.
trans-unit.target: Cuando los elementos de la colección recién agregado hacen el recuento de colección que se exceda la capacidad de la colección, la capacidad se incrementa automáticamente para adaptarse a los elementos de la colección recién agregado.

trans-unit.source: Increasing the collection capacity involves allocating additional collection slots, which incurs both performance and memory overhead.
trans-unit.target: Aumentar la capacidad de colección implica asignar ranuras de colección adicionales, lo que conlleva el rendimiento y la sobrecarga de memoria.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.Capacity%2A> property to optimize the collection capacity in cases where the total or maximum number of collection items is known in advance.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.Capacity%2A> propiedad para optimizar la capacidad de colección en casos donde el número total o máximo de elementos de la colección se conoce de antemano.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.TrimToSize%2A> method to cause the collection capacity to equalized with the current collection count.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.TrimToSize%2A> método para hacer que la capacidad de colección se igualan con el recuento actual de la colección.

trans-unit.source: A collection item to return the index of.
Returns the zero-based index of specified collection item.
The zero-based index of the specified collection item, or **-1** if the specified item is not a member of the collection.
A zero-based index that specifies the position in the collection at which to insert <c>item</c>.
An item to insert into the collection.
Inserts a specified item in the collection at a specified index position.

If <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.Count%2A> equals <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.Capacity%2A> for this collection, the collection capacity automatically is increased before the new item is inserted.
trans-unit.target: Si <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.Count%2A> es igual a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.Capacity%2A> para esta colección, la capacidad de la colección aumenta automáticamente antes de que se inserta el nuevo elemento.

trans-unit.source: Set *index* equal to the value of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.Count%2A>, to append a new collection item to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Establecer *índice* igual que el valor de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.Count%2A>para anexar un nuevo elemento de colección a la colección.

trans-unit.source: Indices for existing collection items may be adjusted to accommodate the newly inserted collection item.
trans-unit.target: Pueden ajustar los índices para los elementos de colección existentes para alojar el elemento de colección recién insertado.

trans-unit.source: Raised when *index* is less than **0**.
Raised when *item* is **null**.
This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Currently, this property always returns **false**.
trans-unit.target: Actualmente, esta propiedad devuelve siempre **false**.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Currently, this property always returns **false**.
trans-unit.target: Actualmente, esta propiedad devuelve siempre **false**.

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index specifying the position of the collection item to retrieve.
Gets the collection item at a specified index.
This is an indexed property.
The collection item at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: El elemento de colección en el índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: This is an indexed property that supports standard indexing syntax (similar to that used to access a particular cell in an array).
trans-unit.target: Se trata de una propiedad indizada que admite la sintaxis de indización estándar (similar a la utilizada para tener acceso a una celda determinada de una matriz).

trans-unit.source: Raised when *index* is less than zero, or when *index* is greater than or equal to <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.Count" />.
An item to remove from the collection.
Removes a specified item from the collection.
**true** if the specified item was found and removed; otherwise, **false**.
Indices for remaining collection items may be adjusted to reflect the removed collection item.
trans-unit.target: Pueden ajustar los índices de los restantes elementos de colección para reflejar el elemento de colección quitado.

trans-unit.source: Raised if *item* is not present in the collection.
Raised when *item* is **null**.
A zero-based index that specifies the collection item to remove.
Removes an item, specified by index, from the collection.
Indices for remaining collection items may be adjusted to reflect the removed collection item.
trans-unit.target: Pueden ajustar los índices de los restantes elementos de colección para reflejar el elemento de colección quitado.

trans-unit.source: Raised when *index* is less than zero, or when *index* is greater than or equal to <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.Count" />.
A zero-based index indicating the beginning of a range of items to remove.
The number of items to remove, beginning from the position specified by <c>index</c>.
Removes a range of items, specified by beginning index and count, from the collection.
Indices for remaining collection items may be adjusted to reflect the removed collection items.
trans-unit.target: Pueden ajustar los índices de los restantes elementos de colección para reflejar los elementos de colección quitados.

trans-unit.source: Raised when *index* or *count* is less than zero, or when *index* is greater than or equal to <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.Count" />.
Raised when *index* and *count* do not specify a valid range in this collection.
This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
An object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Objeto que se puede utilizar para sincronizar el acceso a la colección.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1.GetEnumerator" />.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator`1" /> object that can be used to iterate through the collection.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este miembro es una implementación explícita de un miembro de interfaz.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> interface.
trans-unit.target: Solo se puede utilizar cuando la instancia de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection> se convierte en una interfaz <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator" />.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> object that can be used to iterate through the collection.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este miembro es una implementación explícita de un miembro de interfaz.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface.
trans-unit.target: Solo se puede utilizar cuando la instancia de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection> se convierte en una interfaz <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to add to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection" />.
For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.Add(System.Object)" />.
Use the type-safe <see cref="M:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.Add(System.Windows.Documents.TableColumn)" /> method instead.
The position into which the new element was inserted.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este miembro es una implementación explícita de un miembro de interfaz.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: Solo se puede utilizar cuando la instancia de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection> se convierte en una interfaz <xref:System.Collections.IList>.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.Clear" />.
Use the type-safe <see cref="M:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.Clear" /> method instead.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este miembro es una implementación explícita de un miembro de interfaz.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: Solo se puede utilizar cuando la instancia de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection> se convierte en una interfaz <xref:System.Collections.IList>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to locate in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection" />.
For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.Contains(System.Object)" />.
Use the type-safe <see cref="M:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.Contains(System.Windows.Documents.TableColumn)" /> method instead.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Object" /> is found in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este miembro es una implementación explícita de un miembro de interfaz.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: Solo se puede utilizar cuando la instancia de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection> se convierte en una interfaz <xref:System.Collections.IList>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to locate in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection" />.
For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.IndexOf(System.Object)" />.
Use the type-safe <see cref="M:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.IndexOf(System.Windows.Documents.TableColumn)" /> method instead.
The index of <paramref name="value" /> if found in the list; otherwise, -1.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este miembro es una implementación explícita de un miembro de interfaz.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: Solo se puede utilizar cuando la instancia de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection> se convierte en una interfaz <xref:System.Collections.IList>.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which to insert the <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to insert into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection" />.
For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.Insert(System.Int32,System.Object)" />.
Use the type-safe <see cref="M:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.Insert(System.Int32,System.Windows.Documents.TableColumn)" /> method instead.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este miembro es una implementación explícita de un miembro de interfaz.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: Solo se puede utilizar cuando la instancia de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection> se convierte en una interfaz <xref:System.Collections.IList>.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize" />.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TableCellCollection" /> has a fixed size; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si la interfaz <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TableCellCollection" /> tiene un tamaño fijo; de lo contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este miembro es una implementación explícita de un miembro de interfaz.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: Solo se puede utilizar cuando la instancia de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection> se convierte en una interfaz <xref:System.Collections.IList>.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly" />.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection" /> is read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si la interfaz <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection" /> es de solo lectura; de lo contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este miembro es una implementación explícita de un miembro de interfaz.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: Solo se puede utilizar cuando la instancia de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection> se convierte en una interfaz <xref:System.Collections.IList>.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to get or set.
For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Collections.IList.Item(System.Int32)" />.
Use the type-safe <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.TableCellCollection.Item(System.Int32)" /> property instead.
The element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Elemento en el índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este miembro es una implementación explícita de un miembro de interfaz.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: Solo se puede utilizar cuando la instancia de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection> se convierte en una interfaz <xref:System.Collections.IList>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to remove from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection" />.
For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.Remove(System.Object)" />.

Use the type-safe <see cref="M:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.Remove(System.Windows.Documents.TableColumn)" />, <see cref="M:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.RemoveAt(System.Int32)" />, or <see cref="M:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.RemoveRange(System.Int32,System.Int32)" /> methods instead.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este miembro es una implementación explícita de un miembro de interfaz.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: Solo se puede utilizar cuando la instancia de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection> se convierte en una interfaz <xref:System.Collections.IList>.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item to remove.
For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Collections.IList.RemoveAt(System.Int32)" />.

Use the type-safe <see cref="M:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.Remove(System.Windows.Documents.TableColumn)" />, <see cref="M:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.RemoveAt(System.Int32)" />, or <see cref="M:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.RemoveRange(System.Int32,System.Int32)" /> methods instead.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este miembro es una implementación explícita de un miembro de interfaz.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: Solo se puede utilizar cuando la instancia de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection> se convierte en una interfaz <xref:System.Collections.IList>.

trans-unit.source: Optimizes memory consumption for the collection by setting the underlying collection <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.Capacity" /> equal to the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.TableColumnCollection.Count" /> of items currently in the collection.
This method can be used to minimize memory overhead for a collection, particularly if the set of items contained by the collection is expected to be static.
trans-unit.target: Este método puede utilizarse para minimizar la sobrecarga de memoria para una colección, especialmente si el conjunto de elementos contenidos en la colección debe ser estático.
